title: Scarlet Tempest
description: Selynna has lived her entire life in the remote town of Woodburne. With no biological family, few friends, and some problematic genetic abnormalities, her life hasn't been easy. And when her town begins to see an influx of supernatural visitors, things get even more complicated.After being thrust into a world of mercenaries, magic, danger, and betrayal, her two new companions–a lecherous satyr and an infamous deydre–are the only ones she can turn to. Two virtual strangers who she must now trust with her life.
author: Juniper King
